description: Smoothly undulating palindromic primes of the form (72*10^a(n)-27)/99.
comments: Prime versus probable prime status and proofs are given in the author's table.No further terms < 100000. - _Ray Chandler_, Aug 17 2011
links: Index entries for sequences related to smoothly undulating palindromic primes
author: _Patrick De Geest_ and Hans Rosenthal (Hans.Rosenthal(AT)t-online.de), Jun 15 2001.
